pageProduct.name: Thankyou Moisturising Lotion Bar with Coconut Oil 70g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

MOISTURISING - To leave your skin feeling nourished and soft, we’ve packed the good stuff into this plant-based lotion bar. With coconut oil and shea butter, this bar helps to hydrate and moisturise, leaving you feeling all kinds of nice! The best part? This bar exists to help end global poverty. Talk about a feel-good lotion! MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

In Shower Moisturiser

Ingredients

Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Olive Fruit Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Coconut-derived), Citric Acid, Fragrance, Mandarin Oil, Lemon Myrtle Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Coconut Oil (Organic), Shea Butter (Organic), Polyglyceryl-4-laurate, Water, Vitamin E, Maltodextrin, Polyquaternium-10, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

Directions

The how-to Hold the lotion bar under running water for a few seconds then massage over your skin. A creamy lotion will form which has been designed to moisturise and hydrate. Rub it into your skin, then rinse off lightly. Store the lotion bar in a dry place for next time.
